attributes.review: The entire app is bs. I downloaded it to be a part of something bigger but it only confirmed the absolute worst. The president is idiotic for having this app developed. Such a disappointing app!

attributes.title: GEN Z FOR THE WIN

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app because I wanted to show my support for our favorite orange but it didnâ€™t work how I thought it would. I assumed I would get to send a message directly to the Oompa Loompa, but it just told me to text Trump to 88022 to show my support. I cried myself to sleep that night. When I woke up the next morning, I heard the doorbell ring and someone start yelling. I looked out the window, and who did I see but our Lord Cheeto himself, President Trump! He walked through my door into my house and told me he was there to grant me a wish, so I told him that my one wish was a day at the White House. He responded by yelling at me and telling me to hop away, then proceeded to take my phone and throw it across the room. He then began urinating on my floor, followed by him throwing trash inside my house and breaking through the wall in order to leave. An extreme disappointment, definitely donâ€™t downloadpleasenoticemesenpaitrump.
attributes.title: PRAISE LORD CHEETO

attributes.review: I downloaded because my grandma is unfortunately a majorrrr trump supporter and forced me. I downloaded it and it hacked my entire phone and now everything on my phone is all trump themed. My apps all look like him. The police are outside or my house along with those Mickey Instagram accounts. 100000/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND unless you want the government to have all your data and information and blackmail you into voting for trump ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜–

attributes.review: i genuinely downloaded this app to get the newest information in our president and know how everything would be going down this election. the app takes up so much room and wastes a lot of battery. it also attracts crazyâ€™s. if you use it in public (disclaimer: DONT) it will attract people who are white supremacists and they will want to hurt you!!! donâ€™t download it. it doesnâ€™t help it just makes things worse. i couldnâ€™t sleep at night. i couldnâ€™t poop for 4 days!! a horrible horrible thing and it all happened due to the downloading of this app.
